verses.verse: וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> vay-Hi, came אַחֲרֵי֙ <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei Now after מ֣וֹת <WH4194> Mot the death יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <WH3091> ye-ho-Shu-a', of Joshua וַֽיִּשְׁאֲלוּ֙ <WH7592> vai-yish-'a-Lu asked בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei it came to pass that the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel בַּיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> le-Mor; saying מִ֣י <WH4310> mi Who יַעֲלֶה־ <WH5927> ya-'a-leh- Who shall go up לָּ֧נוּ La-nu אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- against הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֛י <WH3669> hak-ke-na-'a-Ni for us against the Canaanites בַּתְּחִלָּ֖ה <WH8462> bat-te-chil-Lah first לְהִלָּ֥חֶם <WH3898> le-hil-La-chem to fight בּֽוֹ׃ bo.

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD יְהוּדָ֣ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah Judah יַעֲלֶ֑ה <WH5927> ya-'a-Leh; shall go up הִנֵּ֛ה <WH2009> hin-Neh behold נָתַ֥תִּי <WH5414> na-Tat-ti behold I have delivered אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz the land בְּיָדֽוֹ׃ <WH3027> be-ya-Do. into his hand

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוּדָה֩ <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah And Judah לְשִׁמְע֨וֹן <WH8095> le-shim-'on unto Simeon אָחִ֜יו <WH251> 'a-Chiv his brother עֲלֵ֧ה <WH5927> 'a-Leh Come up אִתִּ֣י <WH854> 'it-Ti into בְגוֹרָלִ֗י <WH1486> ve-go-ra-Li, with me into my lot וְנִֽלָּחֲמָה֙ <WH3898> ve-nil-la-cha-Mah that we may fight בַּֽכְּנַעֲנִ֔י <WH3669> bak-ke-na-'a-Ni, against the Canaanites וְהָלַכְתִּ֧י <WH1980> ve-ha-lach-Ti and I likewise will go גַם־ <WH1571> gam- turn אֲנִ֛י <WH589> 'a-Ni I אִתְּךָ֖ <WH854> 'it-te-Cha for בְּגוֹרָלֶ֑ךָ <WH1486> be-go-ra-Le-cha; with thee into thy lot וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <WH1980> vai-Ye-lech went אִתּ֖וֹ <WH854> it-To So שִׁמְעֽוֹן׃ <WH8095> shim-'on. So Simeon

וַיַּ֣עַל <WH5927> vai-Ya-'al went up יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah, And Judah וַיִּתֵּ֧ן <WH5414> vai-yit-Ten delivered יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah-weh and the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַכְּנַעֲנִ֥י <WH3669> hak-ke-na-'a-Ni the Canaanites וְהַפְּרִזִּ֖י <WH6522> ve-hap-pe-riz-Zi and the Perizzites בְּיָדָ֑ם <WH3027> be-ya-Dam; into their hand וַיַּכּ֣וּם <WH5221> vai-yak-Kum and they slew בְּבֶ֔זֶק <WH966> be-Ve-zek, of them in Bezek עֲשֶׂ֥רֶת <WH6235> 'a-Se-ret ten אֲלָפִ֖ים <WH505> 'a-la-Fim thousand אִֽישׁ׃ <WH376> 'Ish. men

וַֽ֠יִּמְצְאוּ <WH4672> Vai-yim-tze-'u And they found אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֲדֹנִ֥י 'a-do-Ni בֶ֙זֶק֙ <WH137> ve-zek Adonibezek בְּבֶ֔זֶק <WH966> be-Ve-zek, in Bezek וַיִּֽלָּחֲמ֖וּ <WH3898> vai-yil-la-cha-Mu and they fought בּ֑וֹ bo; וַיַּכּ֕וּ <WH5221> vai-yak-Ku against him and they slew אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֖י <WH3669> hak-ke-na-'a-Ni the Canaanites וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַפְּרִזִּֽי׃ <WH6522> hap-pe-riz-Zi. and the Perizzites

וַיָּ֙נָס֙ <WH5127> vai-Ya-nos fled אֲדֹ֣נִי 'a-Do-ni בֶ֔זֶק <WH137> Ve-zek, But Adonibezek וַֽיִּרְדְּפ֖וּ <WH7291> vai-yir-de-Fu and they pursued אַחֲרָ֑יו <WH310> 'a-cha-Rav; after וַיֹּאחֲז֣וּ <WH270> vai-yo-cha-Zu him and caught אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> o-To, וַֽיְקַצְּצ֔וּ <WH7112> vay-katz-tze-Tzu, him and cut off אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בְּהֹנ֥וֹת <WH931> be-ho-Not his thumbs יָדָ֖יו <WH3027> ya-Dav and his great וְרַגְלָֽיו׃ <WH7272> ve-rag-Lav. and his great toes

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said אֲדֹֽנִי־ 'a-do-ni- בֶ֗זֶק <WH137> Ve-zek, And Adonibezek שִׁבְעִ֣ים׀ <WH7657> shiv-'Im Threescore and ten מְלָכִ֡ים <WH4428> me-la-Chim kings בְּֽהֹנוֹת֩ <WH931> be-ho-nOt their thumbs יְדֵיהֶ֨ם <WH3027> ye-dei-Hem and their great וְרַגְלֵיהֶ֜ם <WH7272> ve-rag-lei-Hem and their great toes מְקֻצָּצִ֗ים <WH7112> me-kutz-tza-Tzim, cut off הָי֤וּ <WH1961> ha-Yu become מְלַקְּטִים֙ <WH3950> me-lak-ke-Tim gathered תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> Ta-chat up under שֻׁלְחָנִ֔י <WH7979> shul-cha-Ni, [their meat] under my table כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher I עָשִׂ֔יתִי <WH6213> 'a-Si-ti, as I have done כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> ken so שִׁלַּם־ <WH7999> shil-lam- hath requited לִ֖י li אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> E-lo-Him; so God וַיְבִיאֻ֥הוּ <WH935> vay-vi-'U-hu me And they brought יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim him to Jerusalem וַיָּ֥מָת <WH4191> vai-Ya-mot and there he died שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> Sham. there פ Peh

וַיִּלָּחֲמ֤וּ <WH3898> vai-yil-la-cha-Mu had fought בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- Now the children יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah of Judah בִּיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> bi-Ru-sha-Lim, against Jerusalem וַיִּלְכְּד֣וּ <WH3920> vai-yil-ke-Du and had taken אוֹתָ֔הּ <WH853> o-Tah, וַיַּכּ֖וּהָ <WH5221> vai-yak-Ku-ha it and smitten לְפִי־ <WH6310> le-fi- it with the edge חָ֑רֶב <WH2719> Cha-rev; of the sword וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הָעִ֖יר <WH5892> ha-'Ir the city שִׁלְּח֥וּ <WH7971> shil-le-Chu and set בָאֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> va-'Esh. on fire

וְאַחַ֗ר <WH310> ve-'a-Char, And afterward יָֽרְדוּ֙ <WH3381> ya-re-Du went down בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei the children יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah לְהִלָּחֵ֖ם <WH3898> le-hil-la-Chem to fight בַּֽכְּנַעֲנִ֑י <WH3669> bak-ke-na-'a-Ni; against the Canaanites יוֹשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> yo-Shev that dwelt הָהָ֔ר <WH2022> ha-Har, in the mountain וְהַנֶּ֖גֶב <WH5045> ve-han-Ne-gev and in the south וְהַשְּׁפֵלָֽה׃ <WH8219> ve-hash-she-fe-Lah. and in the valley

וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <WH1980> vai-Ye-lech went יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah, And Judah אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- against הַֽכְּנַעֲנִי֙ <WH3669> hak-ke-na-'a-Ni against the Canaanites הַיּוֹשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> hai-yo-Shev that dwelt בְּחֶבְר֔וֹן <WH2275> be-chev-Ron, in Hebron וְשֵׁם־ <WH8034> ve-shem- (now the name חֶבְר֥וֹן <WH2275> chev-Ron of Hebron לְפָנִ֖ים <WH6440> le-fa-Nim before קִרְיַ֣ת kir-Yat אַרְבַּ֑ע <WH7153> 'ar-Ba'; Kirjath-arba וַיַּכּ֛וּ <WH5221> vai-yak-Ku beat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שֵׁשַׁ֥י <WH8344> she-Shai Sheshai וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et אֲחִימַ֖ן <WH289> 'a-chi-Man and Ahiman וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et תַּלְמָֽי׃ <WH8526> tal-Mai. and Talmai

וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <WH1980> vai-Ye-lech went מִשָּׁ֔ם <WH8033> mish-Sham, there אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- against יוֹשְׁבֵ֖י <WH3427> yo-she-Vei against the inhabitants דְּבִ֑יר <WH1688> de-Vir; of Debir וְשֵׁם־ <WH8034> ve-shem- and the name דְּבִ֥יר <WH1688> de-Vir of Debir לְפָנִ֖ים <WH6440> le-fa-Nim before קִרְיַת־ kir-yat- סֵֽפֶר׃ <WH7158> Se-fer. [was] Kirjathsepher

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said כָּלֵ֔ב <WH3612> ka-Lev, And Caleb אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- who יַכֶּ֥ה <WH5221> yak-Keh He that smiteth אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- קִרְיַת־ kir-yat- סֵ֖פֶר <WH7158> Se-fer Kirjathsepher וּלְכָדָ֑הּ <WH3920> u-le-cha-Dah; and taketh וְנָתַ֥תִּי <WH5414> ve-na-Tat-ti it to him will I give ל֛וֹ lo אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עַכְסָ֥ה <WH5915> 'ach-Sah Achsah בִתִּ֖י <WH1323> vit-Ti my daughter לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH802> le-'ish-Shah. to wife

וַֽיִּלְכְּדָהּ֙ <WH3920> vai-yil-ke-Dah took עָתְנִיאֵ֣ל <WH6274> 'a-te-ni-'El And Othniel בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son קְנַ֔ז <WH7073> ke-Naz, of Kenaz אֲחִ֥י <WH251> 'a-Chi brother כָלֵ֖ב <WH3612> cha-Lev Caleb's הַקָּטֹ֣ן <WH6996> hak-ka-Ton younger מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <WH4480> mi-Men-nu; at וַיִּתֶּן־ <WH5414> vai-yit-ten- it and he gave ל֛וֹ lo אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עַכְסָ֥ה <WH5915> 'ach-Sah him Achsah בִתּ֖וֹ <WH1323> vit-To his daughter לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH802> le-'ish-Shah. to wife

וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> vay-Hi came בְּבוֹאָ֗הּ <WH935> be-vo-'Ah, And it came to pass when she came וַתְּסִיתֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH5496> vat-te-si-Te-hu [to him] that she moved לִשְׁא֤וֹל <WH7592> lish-'ol him to ask מֵֽאֵת־ <WH853> me-'et- אָבִ֙יהָ֙ <WH1> 'a-Vi-ha of her father הַשָּׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> has-sa-Deh, a field וַתִּצְנַ֖ח <WH6795> vat-titz-Nach and she lighted מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> me-'Al from הַחֲמ֑וֹר <WH2543> ha-cha-Mor; from off [her] ass וַיֹּֽאמֶר־ <WH559> vai-yo-mer- said לָ֥הּ lah כָּלֵ֖ב <WH3612> ka-Lev and Caleb מַה־ <WH4100> mah- to her What לָּֽךְ׃ Lach.

וַתֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> vat-To-mer And she said ל֜וֹ lo הָֽבָה־ <WH3051> ha-vah- unto him Give לִּ֣י li בְרָכָ֗ה <WH1293> ve-ra-Chah, me a blessing כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki since אֶ֤רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz land הַנֶּ֙גֶב֙ <WH5045> han-Ne-gev me a south נְתַתָּ֔נִי <WH5414> ne-tat-Ta-ni, for thou hast given וְנָתַתָּ֥ה <WH5414> ve-na-tat-Tah give לִ֖י li גֻּלֹּ֣ת <WH1543> gul-Lot me also springs מָ֑יִם <WH4325> Ma-yim; of water וַיִּתֶּן־ <WH5414> vai-yit-ten- gave לָ֣הּ lah כָּלֵ֗ב <WH3612> ka-Lev, And Caleb אֵ֚ת <WH853> 'et גֻּלֹּ֣ת <WH1543> gul-Lot springs עִלִּ֔ית <WH5942> 'il-Lit, her the upper וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> ve-'Et גֻּלֹּ֥ת <WH1543> gul-Lot springs תַּחְתִּֽית׃ <WH8482> tach-Tit. and the nether פ Peh

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei And the children קֵינִי֩ <WH7017> kei-Ni of the Kenite חֹתֵ֨ן <WH2859> cho-Ten father in law מֹשֶׁ֜ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh Moses' עָל֨וּ <WH5927> 'a-Lu went up מֵעִ֤יר <WH5892> me-'Ir out of the city הַתְּמָרִים֙ <WH8558> hat-te-ma-Rim of palms אֶת־ <WH854> 'et- among בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei with the children יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah מִדְבַּ֣ר <WH4057> mid-Bar into the wilderness יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which בְּנֶ֣גֶב <WH5045> be-Ne-gev which [lieth] in the south עֲרָ֑ד <WH6166> 'a-Rad; of Arad וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <WH1980> vai-Ye-lech went וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <WH3427> vai-Ye-shev and dwelt אֶת־ <WH854> 'et- with הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> ha-'Am. the people

וַיֵּ֤לֶךְ <WH1980> vai-Ye-lech went יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah And Judah אֶת־ <WH854> 'et- with שִׁמְע֣וֹן <WH8095> shim-'on with Simeon אָחִ֔יו <WH251> 'a-Chiv, his brother וַיַּכּ֕וּ <WH5221> vai-yak-Ku and they slew אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֖י <WH3669> hak-ke-na-'a-Ni the Canaanites יוֹשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> yo-Shev that inhabited צְפַ֑ת <WH6857> tze-Fat; Zephath וַיַּחֲרִ֣ימוּ <WH2763> vai-ya-cha-Ri-mu and utterly destroyed אוֹתָ֔הּ <WH853> o-Tah, וַיִּקְרָ֥א <WH7121> vai-yik-Ra was called אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שֵׁם־ <WH8034> shem- it And the name הָעִ֖יר <WH5892> ha-'Ir of the city חָרְמָֽה׃ <WH2767> cha-re-Mah. Hormah

וַיִּלְכֹּ֤ד <WH3920> vai-yil-Kod took יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah Also Judah אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עַזָּ֣ה <WH5804> 'az-Zah Gaza וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et גְּבוּלָ֔הּ <WH1366> ge-vu-Lah, with the coast וְאֶֽת־ <WH853> ve-'Et אַשְׁקְל֖וֹן <WH831> ash-ke-Lon thereof and Askelon וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et גְּבוּלָ֑הּ <WH1366> ge-vu-Lah; with the coast וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et עֶקְר֖וֹן <WH6138> ek-Ron thereof and Ekron וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et גְּבוּלָֽהּ׃ <WH1366> ge-vu-Lah. with the coast

וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> vay-Hi become יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶת־ <WH854> 'et- was with יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah, was with Judah וַיֹּ֖רֶשׁ <WH3423> vai-Yo-resh and he drave out אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָהָ֑ר <WH2022> ha-Har; [the inhabitants of] the mountain כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki because לֹ֤א <WH3808> lo but could not לְהוֹרִישׁ֙ <WH3423> le-ho-Rish drive out אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> yo-she-Vei the inhabitants הָעֵ֔מֶק <WH6010> ha-'E-mek, of the valley כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- because רֶ֥כֶב <WH7393> Re-chev because they had chariots בַּרְזֶ֖ל <WH1270> bar-Zel of iron לָהֶֽם׃ la-Hem.
